item.description:
The Fighter (2010)
A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.

Movie is at 7:00 but it is strongly recommended to get there early especially if you want to eat.

If your an email member of Chunky's look for a free movie coupon.

Wendy's organizing this and will be in the lobby at 6pm, but most likely I am a yes ;) if my honey can come.
item.how_to_find_us: be in the lobby at 6pm, or look for meetup sign after that...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: "the fighter" at Chunky's movie theater...
